explains: vt. 使成一团；填塞；使成卷

sentences.en: Philpott tamped a wad of tobacco into his pipe.
sentences.cn: 菲尔波特一团烟丝捣进他的烟斗。

sentences.en: The nurse used a wad of cotton wool to stop the bleeding.
sentences.cn: 护士用了一团脱脂棉止血。

sentences.en: The flies settled on Satan again. He sneezed a wad of snot onto the dash.
sentences.cn: 苍蝇又落在撒旦身上。他打了个喷嚏，一团鼻涕喷到了仪表盘上。
